verbose_text: Three to 5 days later we injected rabies virus coding for the expression of GFP bilaterally into the dLGN of the same animal; reagents were injected in both regions via multiple tracts and at multiple depths to 1) label RGCs axons at different planes along the dorsal-ventral axis, 2) maximize the number of labeled RGCs, and 3) maximize the retinal area in which RGCs exhibited GFP and DiI / DiD labeling.
